name: Zero Proof: Chili Peach Juice
description: Summer is officially in full swing at my local farmer's market: piles of peaches, plums, and apricots are everywhere. My small garden is also bearing fruit, and the pots are bursting with chili peppers. This time of year, pick one and two grow back in its place. Pico de gallo and fruit salsas are always an option, but the peppers are coming in fast and I need something that helps the pile-up.
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon seeded and chopped jalapeno (about 1/4 large)
Garnish: sugar and peach slices if desired

recipeInstructions.text: Place jalapenos, lime juice, and mint leaves in cocktail shaker and muddle gently.
Add ice and juices. Replace top on shaker and shake vigorously for 20 seconds.
To serve, wet rim of glass with lime or peach juice and then dip in a plate of sugar. Pour juice from the shaker into glass and serve immediately, garnished with peach slices if desired.
